description:
Kumi is Ryo Mashiba`s sweet-natured, but hard-working and willful younger sister, and as such understands him better than anyone else. She will do almost anything to support her brother and make him happy, including going to his matches even though she doesn`t like to see him get hurt.
Kumi tends to be modest and shy, but she will stand up for her brother and friends at a moments notice.
Voiced by: Sanae Kobayashi
name: Mashiba Kumi
